# Schwarzberg (Lepontine Alps)

The Schwarzberg (also known as Piz Nair) (2,764 m) is a mountain of the Lepontine Alps, located on the border between the Swiss cantons of Uri and Graub√ºnden. It lies between the valleys of Unteralp (west) and Maighels (east).
